main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Denver, Colo on 13 August 1959, involving a single tear-dropped shaped object with a blue-white color. The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes, with the object entering and disappearing from Earth's atmosphere in a straight trajectory.
interesting points: The sighting involved a single tear-dropped shaped UFO entering and disappearing from the Earth's atmosphere in a straight trajectory.
The object was observed entering the atmosphere multiple times during daylight hours, disappearing and reappearing at intervals.
The UFO was described as blue-white in color and was observed climbing slowly in bright moonlight before disappearing within 10 seconds.
The conclusion drawn from the observation was that it was likely a balloon or a meteor.
The observation included detailed information such as the size, trajectory, and characteristics of the UFO.
sighted object: tear-dropped shaped object with blue-white color
witnesses: The report involved civilian observers and personnel from the Air Force.
photographs: No photographs were included in the report.
